In 1873, a stranger (Daniel Craig) with no memory of his past, is, without knowing why, in a desert town called Absolution. The only clue to his history is a bracelet. Soon, he discovers that he is not welcome and no inhabitant does anything without the order of Colonel Dolarhyde (Ford). That is, is a town that lives in fear. But Absolution is about to experience what it is really fear: the town is attacked by aliens. Now, the stranger they rejected is their only hope of salvation. He slowly starts to remember who he is and where he came from, and realize that you have a secret that could give the town a fighting chance against the invaders. With the help of traveler Ella (Olivia Wilde), he gathers a band formed by his former opponents - Dolarhyde and his men, Apache warriors - among other residents of the city. United against a common enemy, they will prepare for an epic showdown for survival.
